title: Índice
content:
Prefácio

    
      Preface
    

  

  

    1 Noções básicas de urologia pediátrica

    
      1 Embryology of Urinary Tract
      2 Imaging of the Urinary Tract
      3 Renal and Bladder Physiology
      4 Pediatric Urodynamic Assessment
      5 Prenatal Diagnosis and Antenatal Surgery
      6 General Anesthesia Considerations In Children
      7 Physiology of Pediatric Laparoscopy (coming soon)
      8 Laparoscopic and Robotic Applications
      9 Basics of Pediatric Endoscopy
      10 Postoperative Management of Children (coming soon)
      11 Urinary Tract Infection—Management (coming soon)
      12 Congenital Anomalies of the Kidney and Urinary Tract
    

  

  

    2 Rim

    
      13 Cystic Diseases of the Kidney
      14 Hydronephrosis and Ureteropelvic Junction Obstruction
      15 Duplex, Migration, and Fusion Anomalies
    

  

  

    3 Bexiga e Ureter

    
      16 Vesicoureteral Reflux
      17 Megaureter
      18 Diverticula, Urachal Anomalies, and Utricles
      19 Neurogenic Bladder
      20 Voiding Dysfunction
      21 Bladder Exstrophy and Epispadias Complex
      22 Cloacal Exstrophy
      23 New Techniques in Exstrophy Managment (coming soon)
    

  

  

    4 Uretra

    
      24 Posterior Urethral Valves and Infravesical Obstruction
      25 Duplex Urethral Anomalies and Syringocoele
      26 Congenital and Traumatic Urethral Stricture
      27 Prune Belly Syndrome
    

  

  

    5 Genitália Externa Masculina

    
      28 Undescended Testis
      29 Congenital Hydrocele and Inguinal Hernia
      30 Varicocele
      31 Distal Hypospadias
      32 Proximal Hypospadias
      33 Reoperative Hypospadias
      34 Other Penile Abnormalities
      35 Foreskin Anomalies
    

  

  

    6 Genitália Externa Feminina

    
      36 Pediatric Urogynecology
      37 Female Epispadias
      38 Cloacal Anomaly (coming soon)
      39 Urogenital Sinus (coming soon)
    

  

  

    7 Diferenças de desenvolvimento sexual

    
      40 DSD—Current Understanding, Workup and Treatment
      41 Social and Medicolegal Issues with DSD
    

  

  

    8 Oncologia

    
      42 Kidney and Adrenal Malignacies
      43 Bladder Malignancies
      44 Testicular and Paratesticular Tumors in Children
      45 Radiotherapy and Brachytherapy for Pediatric Malignancies (coming soon)
      46 Concepts on the Oncology Team (coming soon)
    

  

  

    9 Pedras, trauma e emergências

    
      47 Urolithiasis—Renal Surgical Management
      48 Urolithiasis—Ureteral Surgical Management
      49 Urolithiasis—Bladder
      50 Urolithiasis—Medical Management
      51 Future Developments in Stone Management (coming soon)
      52 Renal Trauma
      53 Bladder and Ureteral Trauma
      54 Urethral Injury
      55 Penile and Scrotal Trauma
      56 Acute Scrotum
    

  

  

    10 Urologia do adolescente e de transição

    
      57 Long Term Complications of Lower Urinary Tract Reconstruction
      58 Role of Transitional Urology
      59 Long Term Complications of Urogential Reconstruction (coming soon)
    

  

  

    11 Além da fronteira em urologia pediátrica

    
      60 Tissue Engineering—Current Status and Future
      61 Pediatric Urology in 2050
      62 Multicenter Collaboratives in Pediatric Urology (coming soon)
      63 Quality Improvement in Pediatric Urology
      64 Clinical Informatics
      65 Ethical Dilemmas and Considerations
      66 Leadership and Training in Pediatric Urology
      67 Social Media and Learning Opportunities
excerpt: Lista de todos os 67 capítulos do Livro de Urologia Pediátrica.

title: Contate Nos
content:
Entrar em contato
      Sinta-se à vontade para entrar em contato conosco com perguntas, dúvidas, correções ou comentários.
      
      Outros métodos para entrar em contato com os editores
      
        Pediatric Urology Bookc/o Kyle RoveChildren’s Hospital Colorado13123 E. 16th Ave, B-463Aurora, CO 80045United States
        editors@pediatricurologybook.com
      
      
      Mídia social
       Github: kylerove/pediatricurologybook Twitter: @PedUrologyBook Mastodon: @pediatricurologybook@med-mastodon.com YouTube: @pediatricurologybook
